details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم إني أسألك خيرها، وأعوذ بك من شرها
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَهَا، وَأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا
details.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'as'aluka khayrahaa, wa 'a'oo<u>th</u>u bika min sharrihaa.
details.translations: O Allah, I ask You for the good of it and seek refuge in You against its evil.
details.reference: Abu Dawud 4/326, Ibn Majah 2/1228. See also Al-Albani, Sahih Ibn Mjjah 2/305
